cast.original_title: The School for Good and Evil
cast.overview: Best friends Sophie and Agatha navigate an enchanted school for young heroes and villains — and find themselves on opposing sides of the battle between good and evil.
cast.title: The School for Good and Evil

details.biography: Oliver Watson is an actor, writer, and theater maker who has appeared in Tim Burton's Netflix series Wednesday and The School for Good & Evil. He will return for season two of Wednesday, which is expected to be released in 2025. Watson and Max Pemberton co-wrote the full-length play ARTISTS. Separately, there's also an Oliver Watson who is a DJ and the founder of @lostinmusicevents. He's also a natural men's physique athlete.
details.name: Oliver Watson
